sentence.Network_en: Even in the dim light the equipment looked old and timeworn.
sentence.Network_cn: 即便在昏暗的光线下，那台设备也显得陈旧不堪。

entry.tran: 久经使用的;陈旧的;古旧的
entry.def: Something that is time-worn is old or has been used a lot over a long period of time.

example.ex: Even in the dim light the equipment looked old and time-worn...
example.tran: 即便在昏暗的光线下，那台设备也显得陈旧不堪。

example.ex: These time-worn techniques are often very effective approaches to the illnesses of the present day.
example.tran: 这些古老的疗法在治疗当今的疾病时往往非常有效。

means.word_mean: 1. repeated too often; overfamiliar through overuse;
